extendedLocation.description: Gets or sets the extended location.

tags.description: Gets or sets the Resource tags.

kind.description: Metadata used by portal/tooling/etc to render different UX experiences for resources of the same type; e.g. ApiApps are a kind of Microsoft.Web/sites type.  If supported, the resource provider must validate and persist this value.

resourcePoolId.description:
Gets or sets the ARM Id of the resourcePool resource on which this virtual machine will
deploy.

templateId.description: Gets or sets the ARM Id of the template resource to deploy the virtual machine.

vCenterId.description: Gets or sets the ARM Id of the vCenter resource in which this resource pool resides.

moRefId.description: Gets or sets the vCenter MoRef (Managed Object Reference) ID for the virtual machine.

inventoryItemId.description: Gets or sets the inventory Item ID for the virtual machine.

moName.description: Gets or sets the vCenter Managed Object name for the virtual machine.

folderPath.description: Gets or sets the folder path of the vm.

instanceUuid.description: Gets or sets the instance uuid of the vm.

smbiosUuid.description: Gets or sets the SMBIOS UUID of the vm.

powerState.description: Gets the power state of the virtual machine.

customResourceName.description: Gets the name of the corresponding resource in Kubernetes.

uuid.description: Gets or sets a unique identifier for this resource.

vmId.description: Gets or sets a unique identifier for the vm resource.

resourcePoolId.description: Gets or sets the ARM Id of the resourcePool resource on which this virtual machine will deploy.

clusterId.description: Gets or sets the ARM Id of the cluster resource on which this virtual machine will deploy.

hostId.description: Gets or sets the ARM Id of the host resource on which this virtual machine will deploy.

datastoreId.description: Gets or sets the ARM Id of the datastore resource on which the data for the virtual machine will be kept.

allowExtensionOperations.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the VM is ready for extension operations.

osType.description: Gets or sets the type of the os.

toolsRunningStatus.description: Gets or sets the current running status of VMware Tools running in the guest operating system.

toolsVersionStatus.description: Gets or sets the current version status of VMware Tools installed in the guest operating system.

toolsVersion.description: Gets or sets the current version of VMware Tools.

windowsConfiguration.description: Specifies the windows configuration for update management.

linuxConfiguration.description: Specifies the linux configuration for update management.

memorySizeMB.description: Gets or sets memory size in MBs for the vm.

numCPUs.description: Gets or sets the number of vCPUs for the vm.

numCoresPerSocket.description: Gets or sets the number of cores per socket for the vm. Defaults to 1 if unspecified.

cpuHotAddEnabled.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether virtual processors can be added while this virtual machine is running.

cpuHotRemoveEnabled.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether virtual processors can be removed while this virtual machine is running.

memoryHotAddEnabled.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether memory can be added while this virtual machine is running.

networkInterfaces.description: Gets or sets the list of network interfaces associated with the virtual machine.

name.description: Gets or sets the name of the network interface.

label.description: Gets or sets the label of the virtual network in vCenter that the nic is connected to.

ipAddresses.description: Gets or sets the nic ip addresses.

macAddress.description: Gets or sets the NIC MAC address.

networkId.description: Gets or sets the ARM Id of the network resource to connect the virtual machine.

powerOnBoot.description: Gets or sets the power on boot.

networkMoRefId.description:
Gets or sets the vCenter MoRef (Managed Object Reference) ID of the virtual network
that the nic is connected to.

networkMoName.description: Gets or sets the name of the virtual network in vCenter that the nic is connected to.

deviceKey.description: Gets or sets the device key value.

allocationMethod.description: Gets or sets the nic allocation method.

dnsServers.description: Gets or sets the dns servers.

ipAddress.description: Gets or sets the ip address for the nic.

primaryWinsServer.description: Gets or sets the primary server.

secondaryWinsServer.description: Gets or sets the secondary server.

ipAddressInfo.description: Gets or sets the IP address information being reported for this NIC. This contains the same IPv4 information above plus IPV6 information.

allocationMethod.description: Gets the ip address allocation method.

ipAddress.description: Gets the ip address for the nic.

disks.description: Gets or sets the list of virtual disks associated with the virtual machine.

scsiControllers.description: Gets or sets the list of virtual SCSI controllers associated with the virtual machine.

name.description: Gets or sets the name of the virtual disk.

label.description: Gets or sets the label of the virtual disk in vCenter.

diskObjectId.description: Gets or sets the disk object id.

diskSizeGB.description: Gets or sets the disk total size.

deviceKey.description: Gets or sets the device key value.

diskMode.description: Gets or sets the disk mode.

controllerKey.description: Gets or sets the controller id.

unitNumber.description: Gets or sets the unit number of the disk on the controller.

deviceName.description: Gets or sets the device name.

diskType.description: Gets or sets the disk backing type.

type.description: Gets or sets the controller type.

controllerKey.description: Gets or sets the key of the controller.

busNumber.description: Gets or sets the bus number of the controller.

scsiCtlrUnitNumber.description: Gets or sets the SCSI controller unit number.

sharing.description: Gets or sets the sharing mode.

vmUuid.description: Specifies the VM's unique SMBIOS ID.

status.description: The status of the hybrid machine agent.

lastStatusChange.description: The time of the last status change.

clientPublicKey.description: Gets or sets the Public Key provided by the client for enabling guest management.

mssqlDiscovered.description: Specifies whether any MS SQL instance is discovered on the machine.

agentVersion.description: The hybrid machine agent full version.

uefiSettings.description: Specifies the security settings like secure boot used while creating the virtual machine.

secureBootEnabled.description: Specifies whether secure boot should be enabled on the virtual machine.

reason.description: The reason for the condition's status.

message.description: A human readable message indicating details about the status.

severity.description: Severity with which to treat failures of this type of condition.

lastUpdatedAt.description: The last update time for this condition.

createdBy.description: The identity that created the resource.

createdByType.description: The type of identity that created the resource.

lastModifiedBy.description: The identity that last modified the resource.

lastModifiedByType.description: The type of identity that last modified the resource.

lastModifiedAt.description: The timestamp of resource last modification (UTC)

principalId.description: The principal id of managed service identity.

tenantId.description: The tenant of managed service identity.

type.description: The type of managed service identity.

extendedLocation.description: Gets or sets the extended location.

tags.description: Gets or sets the Resource tags.

kind.description: Metadata used by portal/tooling/etc to render different UX experiences for resources of the same type; e.g. ApiApps are a kind of Microsoft.Web/sites type.  If supported, the resource provider must validate and persist this value.

uuid.description: Gets or sets a unique identifier for this resource.

vCenterId.description: Gets or sets the ARM Id of the vCenter resource in which this resource pool resides.

moRefId.description: Gets or sets the vCenter MoRef (Managed Object Reference) ID for the resource pool.

inventoryItemId.description: Gets or sets the inventory Item ID for the resource pool.

moName.description: Gets or sets the vCenter Managed Object name for the resource pool.

cpuSharesLevel.description:
Gets or sets CPUSharesLevel which specifies the CPU allocation level for this pool.
This property is used in relative allocation between resource consumers.

cpuReservationMHz.description:
Gets or sets CPUReservationMHz which specifies the CPU size in MHz that is guaranteed
to be available.

cpuLimitMHz.description:
Gets or sets CPULimitMHz which specifies a CPU usage limit in MHz.
Utilization will not exceed this limit even if there are available resources.

memSharesLevel.description:
Gets or sets CPUSharesLevel which specifies the memory allocation level for this pool.
This property is used in relative allocation between resource consumers.

memReservationMB.description:
Gets or sets MemReservationMB which specifies the guaranteed available memory in
megabytes.

memLimitMB.description:
Gets or sets MemLimitMB specifies a memory usage limit in megabytes.
Utilization will not exceed the specified limit even if there are available resources.

memOverallUsageGB.description: Gets the used physical memory on the pool in GB.

memCapacityGB.description: Gets the total amount of physical memory on the pool in GB.

cpuOverallUsageMHz.description: Gets the used CPU usage across all cores on the pool in MHz.

cpuCapacityMHz.description: Gets the max CPU usage across all cores on the pool in MHz.

forceUpdateTag.description: How the extension handler should be forced to update even if the extension configuration has not changed.

publisher.description: The name of the extension handler publisher.

type.description: Specifies the type of the extension; an example is "CustomScriptExtension".

typeHandlerVersion.description: Specifies the version of the script handler.

enableAutomaticUpgrade.description: Indicates whether the extension should be automatically upgraded by the platform if there is a newer version available.

autoUpgradeMinorVersion.description: Indicates whether the extension should use a newer minor version if one is available at deployment time. Once deployed, however, the extension will not upgrade minor versions unless redeployed, even with this property set to true.

settings.description: Json formatted public settings for the extension.

protectedSettings.description: The extension can contain either protectedSettings or protectedSettingsFromKeyVault or no protected settings at all.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state, which only appears in the response.

type.description: Specifies the type of the extension; an example is "CustomScriptExtension".

typeHandlerVersion.description: Specifies the version of the script handler.

displayStatus.description: The short localizable label for the status.

message.description: The detailed status message, including for alerts and error messages.

systemData.description: Azure Resource Manager metadata containing createdBy and modifiedBy information.

uuid.description: Gets or sets a unique identifier for this resource.

credentials.description: Username / Password Credentials to provision guest agent.

privateLinkScopeResourceId.description: The resource id of the private link scope this machine is assigned to, if any.

httpProxyConfig.description: HTTP Proxy configuration for the VM.

provisioningAction.description: Gets or sets the guest agent provisioning action.

status.description: Gets or sets the guest agent status.

username.description: Gets or sets username to connect with the guest.

password.description: Gets or sets the password to connect with the guest.

moRefId.description: Gets or sets the vCenter MoRef (Managed Object Reference) ID for the virtual machine.

inventoryItemId.description: Gets or sets the inventory Item ID for the virtual machine.

customResourceName.description: Gets the name of the corresponding resource in Kubernetes.

systemData.description: Azure Resource Manager metadata containing createdBy and modifiedBy information.
Azure Resource Manager metadata containing createdBy and modifiedBy information.

resourceUid.description: The unique identifier for the resource.

publicKey.description: Gets or sets the Public Key.

status.description: The overall success or failure status of the operation. It remains "InProgress" until the operation completes. At that point it will become "Unknown", "Failed", "Succeeded", or "CompletedWithWarnings."

assessmentActivityId.description: The activity ID of the operation that produced this result.

rebootPending.description: The overall reboot status of the VM. It will be true when partially installed patches require a reboot to complete installation but the reboot has not yet occurred.

availablePatchCountByClassification.description: Summarization of patches available for installation on the machine by classification.

startDateTime.description: The UTC timestamp when the operation began.

lastModifiedDateTime.description: The UTC timestamp when the operation finished.

startedBy.description: Indicates if operation was triggered by user or by platform.

patchServiceUsed.description: Specifies the patch service used for the operation.

osType.description: The operating system type of the machine.

errorDetails.description: The errors that were encountered during execution of the operation. The details array contains the list of them.

security.description: Number of security patches available for installation.

critical.description: Number of critical patches available for installation.

definition.description: Number of definition patches available for installation.

updateRollup.description: Number of update Rollup patches available for installation.

featurePack.description: Number of feature pack patches available for installation.

servicePack.description: Number of service pack patches available for installation.

tools.description: Number of tools patches available for installation.

updates.description: Number of updates category patches available for installation.

other.description: Number of other patches available for installation.

maximumDuration.description: Specifies the maximum amount of time that the operation will run. It must be an ISO 8601-compliant duration string such as PT4H (4 hours)

rebootSetting.description: Defines when it is acceptable to reboot a VM during a software update operation.

windowsParameters.description: Input for InstallPatches on a Windows VM, as directly received by the API

linuxParameters.description: Input for InstallPatches on a Linux VM, as directly received by the API

classificationsToInclude.description: The update classifications to select when installing patches for Windows.

kbNumbersToInclude.description: Kbs to include in the patch operation

kbNumbersToExclude.description: Kbs to exclude in the patch operation

excludeKbsRequiringReboot.description: Filters out Kbs that don't have an InstallationRebootBehavior of 'NeverReboots' when this is set to true.

maxPatchPublishDate.description: This is used to install patches that were published on or before this given max published date.

classificationsToInclude.description: The update classifications to select when installing patches for Linux.

packageNameMasksToInclude.description: packages to include in the patch operation. Format: packageName_packageVersion

packageNameMasksToExclude.description: packages to exclude in the patch operation. Format: packageName_packageVersion

status.description: The overall success or failure status of the operation. It remains "InProgress" until the operation completes. At that point it will become "Failed", "Succeeded", "Unknown" or "CompletedWithWarnings."

installationActivityId.description: The activity ID of the operation that produced this result.

rebootStatus.description: The reboot state of the VM following completion of the operation.

maintenanceWindowExceeded.description: Whether the operation ran out of time before it completed all its intended actions.

excludedPatchCount.description: The number of patches that were not installed due to the user blocking their installation.

notSelectedPatchCount.description: The number of patches that were detected as available for install, but did not meet the operation's criteria.

pendingPatchCount.description: The number of patches that were identified as meeting the installation criteria, but were not able to be installed. Typically this happens when maintenanceWindowExceeded == true.

installedPatchCount.description: The number of patches successfully installed.

failedPatchCount.description: The number of patches that could not be installed due to some issue. See errors for details.

startDateTime.description: The UTC timestamp when the operation began.

lastModifiedDateTime.description: The UTC timestamp when the operation finished.

startedBy.description: Indicates if operation was triggered by user or by platform.

patchServiceUsed.description: Specifies the patch service used for the operation.

osType.description: The operating system type of the machine.

errorDetails.description: The errors that were encountered during execution of the operation. The details array contains the list of them.

skipShutdown.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to request non-graceful VM shutdown. True value for this flag indicates non-graceful shutdown whereas false indicates otherwise. Defaults to false.

targetVersion.description: Properties for the specified Extension to Upgrade.
